009package imagingbook.common.geometry.basic;
010
011/**
012 * Enum type for different pixel neighborhood types to be used for parameter selection.
013 * 
014 * @author WB
015 *
016 */
017public enum NeighborhoodType2D {
018        /** 4-neighborhood type. */ N4, 
019        /** 8-neighborhood type. */N8;
020}
